message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to go down to $85? I'm really interested in your product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I value this product highly, I could come down to $90 for you. This is my final offer.
